meanings.definition: In a cowardly or timid manner
meanings.sent1: He ran gutlessly from the small dog barking at him.
meanings.sent2: She spoke gutlessly when faced with the difficult decision.
meanings.sent3: The mouse gutlessly avoided the trap set by the cat.
meanings.sent4: The student gutlessly avoided answering the tough question in class.
meanings.sent5: The knight gutlessly retreated from the dragon, leaving the village unprotected.

meanings.sent1: The gutlessly leader refused to take a stand on the important issue.
meanings.sent2: She made a gutlessly attempt at climbing the steep hill.
meanings.sent3: The gutlessly kitten hid from the playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: The gutlessly flower wilted at the first sign of rain.
meanings.sent5: The gutlessly explorer turned back at the sight of the dark cave entrance.
